title: Artosis, StarCraft’s esports casting godfather, moves on
description: Stemkoski's last Global StarCraft II League was referred to by fans and industry colleagues as the end of an era for esports.

title: ‘Marvel Snap’ devs’ first idea was so good they refused to believe it
description: “The first idea’s never the best,” said Ben Brode, co-founder of Second Dinner. But for ‘Marvel Snap,’ it was.

title: Western suppliers cut ties with Chinese chipmakers as U.S. curbs bite
description: New U.S. export controls on chips aim to deprive China of equipment and software it needs to manufacture high-end chips with military applications.

title: ‘A Plague Tale: Requiem’ conjures hope amid the cruelty of a pandemic
description: Three years into our modern pandemic, "A Plague Tale: Requiem's" depictions of disease feel queasily recognizable.

title: Android privacy settings to change now
description: What makes an Android smartphone or tablet truly yours is the apps you use on it, but it’s common for us to install apps without thinking about what we have access to.

title: Kakao is Korea’s app for almost everything. Its outage forced a reckoning.
description: A fire caused a days-long outage of Kakao's messaging, payment and ride-hailing apps. President Yoon Suk-yeol said antitrust concerns would be addressed.
